scripts.build: npm run build:ivac1 && npm run build:aurora
scripts.parse:ivac1: ts-node ./airac-parser/ivac1/airport.ts && ts-node ./airac-parser/ivac1/airway.ts && ts-node ./airac-parser/ivac1/fir.ts && ts-node ./airac-parser/ivac1/ndb.ts && ts-node ./airac-parser/ivac1/vor.ts && ts-node ./airac-parser/ivac1/waypoint.ts && ts-node ./airac-parser/ivac1/area.ts && ts-node ./airac-parser/ivac1/sid.ts && ts-node ./airac-parser/ivac1/star.ts
scripts.parse:aurora: ts-node ./airac-parser/common/airport.ts && ts-node ./airac-parser/common/airway.ts && ts-node ./airac-parser/common/area.ts && ts-node ./airac-parser/common/fir.ts && ts-node ./airac-parser/common/ndb.ts && ts-node ./airac-parser/common/vor.ts && ts-node ./airac-parser/common/waypoint.ts
